Folks,
I need to set up Heritrix to run under Apache, such that Apache is 
forwarding requests to Heritrix, and the Heritrix UI cannot be accessed 
directly from off-box EXCEPT through apache.

Tomcat has a feature that allows you to specify that it will not accept 
direct connections from anywhere other than localhost.  I'd like to set 
up the same thing with Heritrix.  Would anyone know how to do this?

Karl
